data.name: Project Genesis - Halloween Support Pack
data.detailed_description:
Available Only for the Steam Halloween Holiday Sale


As an indie game, Project Genesis' pre-alpha development is only possible with your support!

For a limited time during the Halloween season we are offering two badges and a themed color palette to customize your battle craft and avatar. We thank you for believing in us and hope you'll choose to showcase your participation in the earliest days of Project Genesis pre-alpha development by showing off your gear.

Included in this Support Pack:
  • TWO unique Halloween badges
  • TEN custom-color palette for your battle craft and avatars

In honor of Anubis, the god of the dead, look like a killer:
  • on the leaderboards
  • in your assault pod
  • fighting battle craft in space theater
  • in close-quarter avatar combat

data.short_description: Coming from the underworld this Halloween, show off two new badges and 10 Halloween colors for your battle craft units.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel of AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Project Genesis - Halloween Support Pack
